mapper.select: select id, user_id, title, create_time, view from free_board;
mapper.update: update free_board set view = view + 1 where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into free_board (user_id, title, content, create_time) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, now());
insert into free_comment (board_id, user_id, comment, create_time) values (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{comment}, now());
